• R
  • Python

Here is some R code

lang <- "R"
    other_lang <- "python"
    sprintf("%s is my favorite language, but %s is great too!", lang, other_lang)
[1] "R is my favorite language, but python is great too!"

Here is some separate python code

lang = "python"
    other_lang = "R"
    print(f'{lang} is my favorite language, but {other_lang} is great too!')
python is my favorite language, but R is great too!
